name: NetServiceBrowserDelegate
desc: The interface a net service browser uses to inform a delegate about the state of service discovery.

items.name: func netServiceBrowser(NetServiceBrowser, didFindDomain: String, moreComing: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the sender found a domain.

items.name: func netServiceBrowser(NetServiceBrowser, didRemoveDomain: String, moreComing: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the a domain has disappeared or has become unavailable.

items.name: func netServiceBrowser(NetServiceBrowser, didFind: NetService, moreComing: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the sender found a service.

items.name: func netServiceBrowser(NetServiceBrowser, didRemove: NetService, moreComing: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate a service has disappeared or has become unavailable.

items.name: func netServiceBrowserWillSearch(NetServiceBrowser)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a search is commencing.

items.name: func netServiceBrowser(NetServiceBrowser, didNotSearch: [String : NSNumber])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a search was not successful.

items.name: func netServiceBrowserDidStopSearch(NetServiceBrowser)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a search was stopped.
